description:
Luffy tangles with a monster made of stone, Franky bursts into flames after getting shot by a cannon, and the courageous little people hatch a plan to turn the toys back into humans!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!
Ugoku Shiro! Saikou Kanbu Pica Shutsugen
Un château qui bouge. Pica, le redoutable lieutenant !
Дворец движется! Появление Старшего Лидера Пики!
قلعة متحرّكة! نهوض المسؤول الكبير بيك!
動く城! 最高幹部ピーカ出現
